languages.text: {n}Трупы культистов обращены в головешки разрядами молний, из пустых глазниц, содержимое которых испарилось, вьется дымок. Покрытые кровью невинных одежды грубо размалеваны символами {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, от которых веет мерзостным разложением души.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Трупы культистов обращены в головешки разрядами молний, из пустых глазниц, содержимое которых испарилось, вьется дымок. Покрытые кровью невинных одежды грубо размалеваны символами {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, от которых веет мерзостным разложением души.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The lightning discharges have charred the cultists' corpses. Whiffs of smoke rise from their empty eye sockets, whose contents have evaporated. Their clothes, covered in the blood of innocents, are crudely painted over with emblems of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, which exude a repulsive air of soul decay.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Трупы культистов обращены в головешки разрядами молний, из пустых глазниц, содержимое которых испарилось, вьется дымок. Покрытые кровью невинных одежды грубо размалеваны символами {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, от которых веет мерзостным разложением души.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Blitzentladungen haben die Leichen der Kultisten verkohlt. Rauchschwaden steigen aus ihren leere Augenhöhlen auf, deren Inhalt verdampft ist. Auf ihre Kleidung, mit dem Blut Unschuldiger bedeckt, wurden Embleme des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} gemalt, die einen widerwärtigen Hauch von Seelenverfall ausstrahlen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The lightning discharges have charred the cultists' corpses. Whiffs of smoke rise from their empty eye sockets, whose contents have evaporated. Their clothes, covered in the blood of innocents, are crudely painted over with emblems of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, which exude a repulsive air of soul decay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Blitzentladungen haben die Leichen der Kultisten verkohlt. Rauchschwaden steigen aus ihren leere Augenhöhlen auf, deren Inhalt verdampft ist. Auf ihre Kleidung, mit dem Blut Unschuldiger bedeckt, wurden Embleme des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} gemalt, die einen widerwärtigen Hauch von Seelenverfall ausstrahlen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des décharges électriques ont calciné les corps des cultistes. Des relents de fumée s'élèvent de leurs orbites, dont le contenu s'est tout simplement évaporé. Sur leurs vêtements couverts du sang d'innocents, des emblèmes du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} ont été grossièrement peints, ce qui leur donne un air d'ignoble décomposition spirituelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The lightning discharges have charred the cultists' corpses. Whiffs of smoke rise from their empty eye sockets, whose contents have evaporated. Their clothes, covered in the blood of innocents, are crudely painted over with emblems of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, which exude a repulsive air of soul decay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des décharges électriques ont calciné les corps des cultistes. Des relents de fumée s'élèvent de leurs orbites, dont le contenu s'est tout simplement évaporé. Sur leurs vêtements couverts du sang d'innocents, des emblèmes du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} ont été grossièrement peints, ce qui leur donne un air d'ignoble décomposition spirituelle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些邪教徒的尸体被电流烧焦了。他们空空的眼窝里冒着黑烟，眼睛被彻底蒸发掉了。他们的衣服上沾满了无辜者的鲜血，上面粗糙地画着{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的标志，从中散发出灵魂腐朽的气息，令人心生厌恶。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The lightning discharges have charred the cultists' corpses. Whiffs of smoke rise from their empty eye sockets, whose contents have evaporated. Their clothes, covered in the blood of innocents, are crudely painted over with emblems of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, which exude a repulsive air of soul decay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些邪教徒的尸体被电流烧焦了。他们空空的眼窝里冒着黑烟，眼睛被彻底蒸发掉了。他们的衣服上沾满了无辜者的鲜血，上面粗糙地画着{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的标志，从中散发出灵魂腐朽的气息，令人心生厌恶。{/n}

languages.text: {n}電撃が放出され、教団信者の死体が丸焦げになる。中身が蒸発して空っぽになった眼窩からボフッと煙が上がる。無実の者達の血で濡れた信者達の服は、腐った魂で不快な空気を醸し出す{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos} 渾沌の勢力{/g}の紋章が雑に描かれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The lightning discharges have charred the cultists' corpses. Whiffs of smoke rise from their empty eye sockets, whose contents have evaporated. Their clothes, covered in the blood of innocents, are crudely painted over with emblems of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, which exude a repulsive air of soul decay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}稲妻が放出されて、魔女団信者の死体は丸焦げになった。中身が蒸発して空っぽの眼窩からボフッと煙が上がる。無実の者達の血で濡れた信者達の服は、腐った魂で不快な空気を醸し出す{/g}渾沌の勢力{/n}の紋章が雑に描かれていた。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}

languages.text: {n}Las descargas de rayos han carbonizado los cadáveres de los cultistas. De sus cuencas oculares vacías, cuyo contenido se ha evaporado, salen bocanadas de humo. Sus ropas, cubiertas de sangre de inocentes, están pintadas con emblemas del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, que destilan un repulsivo aire a putrefacción del alma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The lightning discharges have charred the cultists' corpses. Whiffs of smoke rise from their empty eye sockets, whose contents have evaporated. Their clothes, covered in the blood of innocents, are crudely painted over with emblems of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, which exude a repulsive air of soul decay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las descargas de rayos han carbonizado los cadáveres de los cultistas. De sus cuencas oculares vacías, cuyo contenido se ha evaporado, salen bocanadas de humo. Sus ropas, cubiertas de sangre de inocentes, están pintadas con emblemas del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, que destilan un repulsivo aire a putrefacción del alma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yıldırım gibi elektrik boşalımları, tarikatçıların bedenlerini kömüre çevirmiş. İçinde ne var ne yok buhar olmuş boş göz yuvalarından çıkan duman, havaya karışıyor. Masumların kanına bulanmış kıyafetleri; ruhun çürümüşlüğünün tiksindirici havasını yayan, üstünkörü resmedilmiş {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} amblemlerini taşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The lightning discharges have charred the cultists' corpses. Whiffs of smoke rise from their empty eye sockets, whose contents have evaporated. Their clothes, covered in the blood of innocents, are crudely painted over with emblems of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, which exude a repulsive air of soul decay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yıldırımı andıran salınımlar, tarikatçıların bedenlerini kömüre çevirmiş. İçinde ne var ne yok buhar olmuş boş göz yuvalarından çıkan duman, havaya karışıyor. Masumların kanına bulanmış kıyafetleri; çürüyen ruhların tiksindirici kokusunun yayıldığı, üstünkörü resmedilmiş {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g} amblemlerini taşıyor.{/n}
